title: OT105: Ethelthread The Unthready
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread for readers to post about anything they want or ask random questions.
- The author mentions a past comment of the week and highlights a past discussion on Trump's border policy and the effectiveness of walls.
- The author discusses banning several people who rightfully deserved it in the previous month, and thanks readers for reporting comments.

Key learnings:
- This post does not contain any educational content or key learnings, but rather serves as an update and invitation to readers.

Key questions:
- None presented in this post.
